name: Air Canada in Talks to Buy Air Transat
description:
More excitement in the Canadian aviation industry! On Thursday May 16th, Air Canada announced that they were in talks to purchase Air Transat, Canada's third largest airline. Here's my coverage of announcement, and what an integrated Air Transat/Air Canada fleet would look like, if the deal is approved!
